extensionDescription.message: Replaces subtitles in the NPO player with auto-translated subtitles.

popupDescription.message: Replace NPO subtitles with auto-translated subtitles.

popupStatusReady.description: PubNL Translator is on and ready to translate.

popupStatusReload.message: Refresh NPO webpages to see changes.
popupStatusReload.description: Tells the user to reload open NPO tabs to see changes.

popupTargetLanguage.description: Choose the language to translate to.

popupNotifyMe.description: Choose whether to be notified when PubNL Translator is translating.

popupViewCached.description: Click to view the cached subtitles.

popupReportIssue.description: Click to report an issue with PubNL Translator.

popupLeaveFeedback.description: Click to leave feedback about PubNL Translator.

popupAbout.description: Click to see more information about PubNL Translator.

aboutExternalDependencies.description: External sources used to make PubNL Translator.

cacheTitle.description: Cache of all currently stored translated subtitles.

notificationTitle.description: Tells the user what the notification is about.

notificationTranslating.description: Tells the user that PubNL Translator is translating.

notificationUsingCached.description: Tells the user that PubNL Translator is using cached subtitles.

notificationUsingOriginal.message: Subtitles are already in $language$. Using original subtitles.
notificationUsingOriginal.description: Tells the user that PubNL Translator is using the original subtitles.

notificationLanguageError.message: Error determining source language. Using original subtitles.
notificationLanguageError.description: Tells the user that PubNL Translator encountered a problem determining the source language.

notificationTranslationError.message: Error translating to $language$. Using original subtitles.
notificationTranslationError.description: Tells the user that PubNL Translator encountered a problem translating subtitles.

unknown.description: Used in various places when data is not known.

backgroundDocumentTitle.description: Document title of the background page.
